summary: Energy engineer and project manager with over 13 years of successful experience in project management, writing and execution of technology development and innovation proposals, project monitoring and control, and numerical and problem-solving skills. Recognized consistently for performance excellence and contributions to success in sustainable energy and more recently in the construction industry and circular economy. Strengths in energy assessments, energy and exergy analysis, LCA, and sustainable energy systems backed by professional experience and training.
